item.title: WoW Emergent Media Phenomenon @ Laguna Art Museum
item.description: There is an interesting even being held at the Laguna Arts Museum in Laguna Beach. From June 14th to Oct 4th 2009, the museum is hosting a Art Exhibit on the Emergent Media Phenomenon of World of Warcraft . Normally I would say that this type of even it usually only appreciated by the fans of World of Warcraft (like me), but I think that anyone with a eye for decent art would appreciate it.
